title: Is your tech strategy good, or just AI theatre?
description: Artificial intelligence has become the business world’s favourite performance recently. FTSE 100 earnings calls now mention AI more than inflation, and investor briefings increasingly resemble tech expos. Analysts report that AI references in UK company filings have tripled in the past year, yet the results aren’t matching the rhetoric. Markets are beginning to glance sideways. [...]

title: Instagram will limit content for teenagers based on PG-13 ratings
description: The restrictions also apply to conversations between teenage users and artificial intelligence chatbots.
content:

On Oct 14, it took them a step further.

title: MegazoneCloud's AIR Studio Earns Korea's First ISO/IEC 42001 Certification for AI Management Systems
description: SEOUL, South Korea, Oct. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- MegazoneCloud, a leading AI-native digital transformation company, today announced that its enterprise AI platform, Megazone AIR Studio, has achieved ISO/IEC 42001 certification, the world's first international standard for Artificial Intelligence Management Systems (AIMS).

title: Go ahead, adopt AI for education, but sharpen the critical capacity of students too
description: As artificial intelligence (AI) storms the world, India’s education system clearly needs to adapt. But the stakes in this field are profoundly high. Given the risk of AI tools going out of alignment with our best interests, AI adoption at the school level must satisfy the strictest of safety tests.
content:
Its rise has already shaken India’s software sector, which needs full R&D mastery over it to make a proper AI pivot, even if adaptation is the urgency right now.

title: Foundations want to curb AI developers’ influence with $500 million aimed at centering human needs
description: Ten philanthropic foundations are committing the funding across the next five years to place human interests at the forefront of artificial intelligence’s rapid integration into daily life.
content:
NEW YORK — Artificial intelligence is a matter of design — not destiny.
